patthana14.1:2.1_0: Hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā
patthana14.1:2.1_1: khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ; paṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe… hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu
patthana14.1:2.1_2: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ca nanahetu ca dhammā
patthana14.1:3.1_0: Nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
patthana14.1:3.1_1: nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ca nanahetu ca
patthana14.1:4.1_0: Hetuñca nahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuñca nahetuñca
patthana14.1:4.1_1: dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuñca nahetuñca dhammaṁ
patthana14.1:4.1_2: paṭicca nahetu ca nanahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana14.1:5.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate nava. (Sahajātavārampi …pe… sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṁ.)
patthana14.1:6.1: Hetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana14.1:7.1: Hetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana14.1:8.1: Nahetu dhammo nanahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana14.1:9.1: Hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana14.1:10.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava …pe… upanissaye nava, purejāte pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane
patthana14.1:10.1_1: nava, kamme tīṇi, vipāke nava, āhāre tīṇi, indriye nava, jhāne tīṇi, magge sampayutte
patthana14.1:10.1_2: nava, vippayutte pañca …pe… avigate nava. (Pañhāvārampi evaṁ vitthāretabbaṁ.)
